blog.name: moodyvoid
blog.title: Moody Void
blog.description: • The League of Villains took my soul oops • •BNHA•

tags: ive been all about the todorokis recently
summary: Shouto has conspiracies about everyone except his own family.
body:
Shouto has conspiracies about everyone except his own family.

Shouto, seeing Midoriya: “I think Midoriya is All Might’s secret love child.”

Shouto, seeing Shinsou: “I think Shinsou is Aizawa’s secret love child.”

Shouto, seeing Mineta: “I think Mineta formed from some sort of dumpster goblin.”

Shouto, seeing Dabi: “Who are you?”

Dabi: “Wait, seriously?… I’m your brother.”

Shouto: “That’s the most ridiculous thing I’ve ever heard.”

summary: male matchup please? i'm quick witted and clever. i have a very sweet disposition, but when i'm irritated or upset, my bite is...
question: male matchup please? i'm quick witted and clever. i have a very sweet disposition, but when i'm irritated or upset, my bite is extremely sharp. typically patient and slow to anger. i'm a bit too realistic and i don't sugarcoat anything. i love meteorology and i used to want to be a storm/tornado chaser. i'm talented at cooking and baking and i love making food for the people i care about. i tend to avoid overly rambunctious and loud people, but i give good advice if need be. thank you! <3
answer:
I WANTED TO BE A STORM/TORNADO CHASER TOO LMFAOOO.

✎ Toshinori Yagi (All Might)

  • toshinori’s the one for you!
  • he knows of your aversion to loud, boisterous people, so he tends to keep to his normal form and reserves his muscle form for outside of the household. he’s much more quiet and reserved in his skinny form, which is just perfect for the both of you.
  • he loves your quick wit, he thinks its admirable the way you can respond so sharply and without hesitation. he especially loves it when you wipe the floor with your wit alone - you do it in such a graceful way that he can’t help but fall more in love with you. he also loves your intelligence, and can’t help but laugh at himself whenever you start talking about something and he can’t understand 90% of the words you say.
  • he also loves you sweet, patient and caring nature. whenever he sees you helping people or just in general his heart just melts and he questions how he got so lucky to get such a sweet s/o.
  • but there is absolutely no way he’d ever want to get on your bad side. he knows you’re incredibly patient and knows the warning signs when you start to get angry, so he quickly jumps in to try and diffuse the situation before things get out of hand. he knows that your bark is strong, but your bite is stronger.
  • he greatly appreciates how realistic you are. sometimes it can be a little bit overwhelming and morbid, but he likes the fact that you tell it to him as it is. sometimes people don’t tell the truth and lay it on thick, but he knows he can rely on you to analyse the situation and give him an honest answer. when it comes to advice he always goes to you because he knows he can trust you.
  • when he learned about your dream of becoming a storm/tornado chaser he was terrified. there was no way he’d ever let you put yourself in that much danger, so he was glad when you finally let it go and decided to go for a slightly safer meteorology interest. he thinks its amazing that you know so much about the atmosphere and how it contributes to the weather you experience daily but never think twice about. he never though he’d be so interested in learning about clouds!
  • he loves the fact that you have a passion to cook and bake because he has absolutely no talent in that field at all. of course he’s willing to help you where he can but mostly he leaves it to you and instead is the designated taste-tester. he’s always willing to try new recipes out and will always go out to buy you the ingredients you need if you don’t have something on hand at home. his favourite thing is when he comes home is being hit by the waft of the delicious dish you’ve masterfully crafted for the two of you.
  • most importantly he loves you a lot and would do anything for you. you’re his everything and if anything were to ever happen to you he could never forgive himself. he loves you with every bone in his body and knows that he can trust you to be there to support him. he likes to remind you that he’ll always be there for you, quirkless or not. he’s a shoulder to lean on in times of need and is always willing to listen to any worries or stresses you may have.

written on 24/04/2019. requests: open. matchups: open.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THESE MATCH-UPS ARE JUST FOR FUN AND IF YOU DON’T LIKE THEM I’M SORRY! I TRY MY BEST AND PICK SOMEONE BASED ON WHAT I THINK AND IF YOU DON’T AGREE THAT’S FINE BUT NO HATE PLS <3 I TRY MY BEST!

blog.title: AO3 feed for Shigaraki Tomura x Dabi
blog.description: Using an IFTTT server to post the feed here.

title: Worse to Worst
body:
by Sissytobitch10seconds

He didn’t want to be a bride and baby-maker to some rich asshole, so he ran away. Little did he know that he was about to meet someone who was worse than his father in terms of abuse.

Words: 3421, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Rape/Non-Con
  • Categories: F/M, M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Todoroki Touya, Dabi (My Hero Academia), Todoroki Fuyumi, Todoroki Natsuo, Todoroki Shouto, Todoroki Enji | Endeavor, Toga Himiko, Hawks (My Hero Academia), Chisaki Kai | Overhaul, Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Eri (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Dabi/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Chisaki Kai | Overhaul/Dabi/Hawks, Dabi/Hawks (My Hero Academia), Chisaki Kai | Overhaul/Hawks, Chisaki Kai | Overhaul/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Chisaki Kai | Overhaul/Dabi/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko/Hawks, Chisaki Kai | Overhaul/Dabi/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Dabi/Toga Himiko
  • Additional Tags: Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Dabi is a Todoroki, Dabi is Todoroki Touya, Omega Todoroki Touya, Omega Dabi, Alpha Todoroki Enji | Endeavor, Alpha Chisaki Kai | Overhaul, omega hawks, Omega Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Alpha Toga Himiko, Abuse, Rape, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Child Abuse, Grooming, Kidnapping, marital rape, Pregnancy, Unplanned Pregnancy, Running Away, Miscarriage, Rape/Non-con Elements, Past Rape/Non-con, Rape Aftermath, Rape Recovery, Graphic Rape/Non-Con, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Alternate Universe, Alternate Universe - No Quirks (My Hero Academia), Angst, Fluff and Angst, Heavy Angst, Dabi (My Hero Academia)-centric

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Uh, hey love! Can I get a student matchup? I'm fairly tall (almost 6 ft), have really short dark brown hair, and green eyes. I...
question: Uh, hey love! Can I get a student matchup? I'm fairly tall (almost 6 ft), have really short dark brown hair, and green eyes. I freaking live for music and art, and am like, super introverted. Mental health wise, I'm not the best and struggle with my self-esteem. I really really like videogames, too!! (Thanks, love!! <3)
answer:
I would match you up with Jirou! Jirou loves being with tall people, she likes to just hide behind you if she gets nervous and she loves the whole height difference aesthetic. She loves that your warm hands are bigger than hers so she loves to hold your hands, it just brings her comfort! Jirou is a lover of many kinds of art, so she definitely can have a long conversation on your favorite topics. She’ll just lay her head on your lap and you two can talk about your favorite songs or bands. Late night video game sessions are a must, cuddled under blankets and just enjoying your time together! Super smash bros fights get intense and whoever wins the most battles gets to choose the next date location!



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Hi may I get a match up?I’m like 5’3+female. I like boys. I’m really light hearted and have to always be supported or support...
question: Hi may I get a match up?I’m like 5’3+female. I like boys. I’m really light hearted and have to always be supported or support someone. I love floofy or frilly clothing and pastel colors. I am very touchy but I need some space sometimes.I love plants and want to garden. I draw all the time+I have a pet bird named Booberry who I adore even tho he’s super sass. I have pretty light skin and short choppy brown hair. My eyes change colors a lot but I just say they’re blue overall.I love baking so:)💖
answer:
I would pair you up with Shinsou! I love the idea of your two aesthetics clashing, it would be super cute to see you walking hand and hand, him in darkly colored clothing and you in cute pastel colors. Shinsou loves Booberry and probably has tried to teach them a variety of different phrases to make you laugh. He loves how supportive you are since you cheer him on everything! You probably cheer for him to get a night of better sleep, haha! He always blushes when you do stuff along those lines, he also turns red when he offers you his support as well! Also whenever you bake something Shinsou can die happily, your desserts just taste so amazing. He probably eats them to keep him up at night for studying for a test or something along those lines.



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

title: BNHA Manga Chapter 226 Reactions - SPOILERS!
body:
“What a fastinating phrase”, I like the choice of words.

Wh-why Ochako? ISN’T THIS INCREDIBLY DANGEROUS FOR HER?? O.O’’’’

Unexpected IzuOcha moment LOL. That’s why Ochako. She admires/envies her. Toga will probably be Ochako’s main antagonist in the final arc of BNHA, I believe; just as Shigaraki = Deku and AFO = AM (and maybe Dabi = Todoroki).

But it’s not nice to swallow your important people’s blood, Toga. Not completely ‘cause they die xD, and not without their consent. I’m starting to think there might be a way that works for her in this society, though… (just think of how BDSM is possible AS LONG AS both lovers are OK with it and how each one has a role).

Shoot! Was she able to imitate other’s quirks too? Had she before?? I don’t remember, but I don’t think so… isn’t this a problem if she takes Deku’s power?O.O Like, Monoma could avoid getting his bones rekt, basically, because of his quirk’s mechanism, as we were explained a while ago… but what about Toga then?

Also, she seems to maintain people’s blood for MONTHS (?). That’s a problem for the heroes, I get… AND, she can also perfectionate her quirk or learn more ways to use it that may even escape Ochako’s imagination… WOW this really has multiple potentialities, can’t way to see how Horikoshi will manage that.

Wow this entire page is incredible. That “cuteness is evil” little message, though XD

summary: I am thinking of you doing my Ace Akihiro OC with the A1 expression. And Tokoyami for C3 plz if you’re available for requests?...
question: I am thinking of you doing my Ace Akihiro OC with the A1 expression. And Tokoyami for C3 plz if you’re available for requests? *nervously asks*
answer: Done at last! I apologize for the delay, for Ace hair color(my lighter green marker was supposed to work as intended but ended up with this darker shade of green instead -.-’) and for the weirdness of Toko’s face, I tried my best but I’m not familiar with animal-human hybrids, I hope you’ll still like it tho! Thank you so much for requesting me :3

summary:
A server for me and others to converse my special interests and hyperfixations :p
Fandoms included (but not limited...
body:
A server for me and others to converse my special interests and hyperfixations :p

Fandoms included (but not limited to):

  • Ninjago
  • Boku no hero academia
  • Monster High
  • My Little Pony

Rules:

• dont be racist/homophobic/transphobic/etc (I’ll just kick you)

• be aware of what people blacklist and tag as needed

• dont make fun of or bully people

• make sure you’re using the right channels ^^

• you’re allowed to mute certain channels just dont harass people for liking things

• NO NSFW (jokes are fine I guess but no straight up porn)

blog.name: theenigmaofriversong
blog.title: The Long way round
blog.description: Clara sometimes asks me if I dream. Of course I dream, I tell her. Everybody dreams. But what do you dream about, she'll ask. The same thing everybody dreams about, I tell her. I dream about where I'm going. She always laughs at that. But you're not going anywhere, you're just wandering about. That's not true. Not any more. I have a new destination. My journey is the same as yours, the same as anyones. It's taken me so many years, so many lifetimes, but at last I know where I'm going. Where I've always been going. Home...

tags: well this was fun to make

summary: hello guys! i have been inactive for almost a year and now that im back and im catching up im looking for new blog to follow. so...
caption:
hello guys! i have been inactive for almost a year and now that im back and im catching up im looking for new blog to follow. so if you post some of the following content please reblog and tag it:

  • akatsuki no yona 
  • bleach
  • boku no hero academia
  • bungou stray dogs 
  • fullmetal alchemist
  • gintama
  • hunter x hunter
  • kuroshitsuji
  • manhuas/manhwas (19 days, etc.)
  • mob psycho pass
  • naruto
  • one punch man
  • owari no seraph
  • psycho pass
  • seasonal anime (write in the tag which one cause im currently struggling)
  • shingeki no kyojin
  • sports anime
  • studio ghibli
  • the promised neverland
  • tokyo ghoul
  • anime/manga in general

bonus:

  • you are a graphic/gif maker
  • you have a tagging system.
  • you’re following me. 

THANK YOU AND HAVE A NICE DAY!
